OOC: I think I'm going to make him comic relief.  Think Waspinator.

::Ender::
       One of Nightlight shots took his head off.  The disembodied head began 
rolling around on the ground.  "Now that was just plain mean."  He focuses on 
his body.  "Oh body.  I'm over here.  You Hoo."  He whistles.  His body 
begins groping around on the ground.  "No, that's a rock... Over here.  
That's good.  A little to your right.  Your other right."  One of the hands 
finally grabs the top of his head.  "There we go."  It picks him up and 
reattaches the head ... backwards.  "Argh, you stupid me.  This is no good, 
well at least I won't get shot in the back of the head any more."

--part1_1b8.2ad54c2.2a55352b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Over here.  That's good.  A little to your right.  Your <I>other</I> right."  One of the hands finally grabs the top of his head.  "There we go."  It picks him up and reattaches the head ... backwards.  "Argh, you stupid me.  This is no good, well at least I won't get shot in the back of the head any more."</FONT></HTML>
